summary: Completed comprehensive testing of BULL SAGE trading platform focusing on review request features. All major functionalities working excellently with 96.3% success rate.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 404 for some coin detail requests
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - coin chart data still works
Academy page loads but lessons API missing
